entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few rain showers beginning early this evening then changing to a few flurries overnight. Snow level 2300 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
